revision.comment: Farzaneh moved page [[Talk:Operation Undeniable Victory]] to [[Talk:Operation Fath ol-Mobin]]: The title is a misnomer and the operation has not been known by this name in any source.
revision.text:
{{talkheader}} {{WikiProject Military History|class=start|importance=high |B-Class-1=no |B-Class-2=yes |B-Class-3=yes |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=yes |Middle-Eastern=yes }} == To the original author ==
I commend your original effort in producing this article on, what is, possibly one of the most decisive campaigns in modern history.
I realise that I have made some major changes to the article, but I'm glad that you assessed my work objectively, and did not reverse the changes so that your original input returned. I'm also glad that you added to my knowledge with your own pointers.
Together, I hope that the article now reflects a much more accurate piece of work.
([[User:EasyPeasy21|EasyPeasy21]] 19:54, 2 June 2007 (UTC))
It's all about making the artickles good isn't it and not about you having done more things yourself. [[User:Kermanshahi|The Honorable Kermanshahi]] 17:00, 5 June 2007 (UTC)
Sorry, I did look like I was emphasizing my own contribution there. I meant to say that an article undergoes natural improvement; and we have both strived to do justice to this operation. [[User:EasyPeasy21|EasyPeasy21]] 21:05, 5 June 2007 (UTC)
I've made the article about ''[[General Sayed Shirazi]]''. He became promoted to the rank of general in 1973. In March 1982, he did what he is probably best known for; leading Irans' troups to their "'''Undeniable Victory'''", during [[Operation Undeniable Victory]]. (you probably know that ;) . But I don't know much more, maybe you do? [[User:Haggawaga - Oegawagga|-)-(-H- (|-|) -O-)-(-]] 06:20, 7 June 2007 (UTC)
Yeah but it was full of bogus, I made a new article about him named [[Ali Sayad Shirazi]] mayde you want to help expand it [[User:EasyPeasy21|EasyPeasy21]], but I already made a lot of it. [[User:Kermanshahi|The Honorable Kermanshahi]] 21:55, 30 June 2007 (UTC)
I have to say that the article on Shirazi is excellent. Well done. :D [[User:EasyPeasy21|EasyPeasy21]] 19:15, 10 July 2007 (UTC)
Thanks, I put a lot of work in it. [[User:Kermanshahi|The Honorable Kermanshahi]] 09:14, 27 July 2007 (UTC)
